settings.text_content: At IberTechSystems, we stand behind the quality and reliability of our automation solutions. Our products are designed for durability, security, and seamless operation. To ensure customer satisfaction, we offer comprehensive warranty coverage for our motors, remote controls, and accessories.

settings.table_content:
We provide the following warranty periods for our products:

Product TypeWarranty Period
Gate & Garage Motors2-5 Years
Remote Controls1 Year
Accessories1 Year

settings.text_content:
• Manufacturing defects
  • Malfunction due to normal use
  • Replacement or repair of defective parts

• Damage due to improper installation or misuse
  • Wear and tear from excessive use
  • Modifications or repairs by unauthorized personnel
  • Environmental damage (floods, lightning, etc.)

If you experience an issue with your product, follow these steps to make a warranty claim:

  1. Check Troubleshooting Guides – Refer to our support materials to see if the issue can be resolved.
  2. Gather Proof of Purchase – Keep your invoice or receipt as proof of purchase.
  3. Contact Customer Support – Reach out to our team via phone or email with details about the issue.
  4. Inspection & Resolution – Our team will assess the product and determine whether it qualifies for repair or replacement.

To ensure warranty validity, we recommend:

  • Professional installation for gate and garage motors
  • Regular maintenance checks, including lubrication and battery replacement
  • Using only approved accessories and replacement parts
For additional peace of mind, IberTechSystems offers extended warranty plans. Contact our sales team for more details on eligibility and pricing.

settings.cta_text:
For warranty inquiries or claims, reach out to us:

Email: support@ibertechsystems.com

Phone: [Customer Service Number]

Website: Visit our website

At IberTechSystems, we are committed to providing high-quality automation solutions and excellent customer support. Your satisfaction is our priority!
